alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 11:14PM EST until January 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches for a storm total of 2 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central, west central, and western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
